interpretation:
Opener:	 has 13-21 points and 4+ diamonds.
	Denies 5 card major
	Denies balanced hand
Responder:	Has 6+ points
	May have support for opener's suit
	Has 4+ spades
	May have 5 hearts

hints.hint0:
Look for 4 spades to support responder
Bid valid only in competition
Not forcing
hints.hint1:
Small=13-15, Medium=16-18, Large=19-21
Look for 4S card support or 6+ in opening suit
hints.hint2:
13-15	4S: 2S
	6+D: 2D
	Competition: Pass
	Default: 1NT
16-18	4S: 3S
	Balanced, 18+: 2NT
	6+D: 3D
	Default: 2NT
19-21	4S: 4S
	Balanced: 3NT
	6+D: 2NT
	Default: 3NT
